vernac_cmds: Lemma Invariant_t_O : BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (R1 0) size) (R2 0)) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 0).

Lemma inv_ind_false : forall t n : nat, (n <= size -> BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (R1 n) (size - n)) (R2 n)) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 n)) -> S n <= size -> n <= size -> BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (appbv (highs (R1 n)) (Mux false (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0) (consbv (lowbit (R2 n)) nilbv))) (size - S n)) (appbv (highs (Mux false (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) (R2 n))) (Mux false (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv) (consbv false nilbv)))) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (appbv (truncbv V1 n) (consbv false nilbv)).
replace (power2 n * BV_to_nat (consbv (lowbit (R2 n)) nilbv) + power2 (S n) * BV_to_nat (highs (R2 n))) with (power2 n * BV_to_nat (R2 n)).

Lemma inv_ind_true : forall t n : nat, (n <= size -> BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (R1 n) (size - n)) (R2 n)) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 n)) -> S n <= size -> n <= size -> BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (appbv (highs (R1 n)) (Mux true (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0) (consbv (lowbit (R2 n)) nilbv))) (size - S n)) (appbv (highs (Mux true (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) (R2 n))) (Mux true (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv) (consbv false nilbv)))) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (appbv (truncbv V1 n) (consbv true nilbv)).
rewrite (mult_plus_distr2 (BV_to_nat V2) (BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 n)) (power2 (lengthbv (truncbv V1 n)) * 1)).
replace (power2 n + power2 n) with (power2 (S n)).

replace (power2 n * BV_to_nat (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0) + (power2 (S n) * BV_to_nat (stripbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 1) + power2 (n + size) * bool_to_nat (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false))) with (power2 n * BV_to_nat (R2 n) + BV_to_nat V2 * power2 n).
replace size with (lengthbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false)).
replace (bool_to_nat (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false)) with (BV_to_nat (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv)).
replace (appbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv)) with (BV_full_adder (R2 n) V2 false).
replace (length V1) with (lengthbv V1); auto with arith.
Lemma Invariant : forall t : nat, t <= size -> BV_to_nat (appbv (stripbv (R1 t) (size - t)) (R2 t)) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 t).
replace (elemlist bool V1 n) with (abit V1 n).
replace (consbv (lowbit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false)) nilbv) with (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0).
replace (consbv (lowbit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false)) nilbv) with (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0).
Theorem Correct : BV_to_nat (appbv (R1 size) (R2 size)) = BV_to_nat V2 * BV_to_nat V1.

command: replace (power2 n * BV_to_nat (consbv (lowbit (R2 n)) nilbv) + power2 (S n) * BV_to_nat (highs (R2 n))) with (power2 n * BV_to_nat (R2 n)).
rewrite (mult_plus_distr2 (BV_to_nat V2) (BV_to_nat (truncbv V1 n)) (power2 (lengthbv (truncbv V1 n)) * 1)).
replace (power2 n + power2 n) with (power2 (S n)).

replace (power2 n * BV_to_nat (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0) + (power2 (S n) * BV_to_nat (stripbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 1) + power2 (n + size) * bool_to_nat (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false))) with (power2 n * BV_to_nat (R2 n) + BV_to_nat V2 * power2 n).
replace size with (lengthbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false)).
replace (bool_to_nat (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false)) with (BV_to_nat (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv)).
replace (appbv (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) (consbv (BV_full_adder_carry (R2 n) V2 false) nilbv)) with (BV_full_adder (R2 n) V2 false).
replace (length V1) with (lengthbv V1); auto with arith.
replace (elemlist bool V1 n) with (abit V1 n).
replace (consbv (lowbit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false)) nilbv) with (abit (BV_full_adder_sum (R2 n) V2 false) 0).
